sentences.sContent: Two of the most important dimensions of structure are centralization and departmentalization.
sentences.sContent_eng: Two of the most important dimensions of structure are centralization and departmentalization.
sentences.sCn: 在组织结构中最关键的两个维度是集中化和部门化。

sentences.sContent: The Song Dynasty has civil political view, high centralization of authority, perfect imperial examination, which are the three reasons for its welldevelopment of civil service system.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Song Dynasty has civil political view, high centralization of authority, perfect imperial examination, which are the three reasons for its welldevelopment of civil service system.
sentences.sCn: 宋代文治的政治主张、高度的中央集权、完备的科举制度是其得以充分发展的三大原因。

words.tran: 固定于中心的；在中心的
中立派议员；中间派议员
中央集权制；中央集权主义
中央交换机；市话交换分局
温和主义，中间路线；中间派的政策
集中（centre的过去分词）；把…置于中央
使集中；使成为…的中心；使集权
